participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Alex loves to explore new places and meet new people.
participant_1.background: I love the chainsmokers. I work as a lifeguard. I love to play tennis. My dad works offshore. I also love to travel.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and determined, Jamie has a passion for cooking and dreams of opening her own bakery.
participant_2.background: I work 9 to 5 job. My family owned a small restaurant. I like to cook. When I retire I want to open a bakery.

content.text: Nice to meet you, participant_1! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, travel, and read. I also love to play tennis.
Oh, that's cool! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I'm also really good at making desserts.
I love pasta! Do you have any favorite recipes?
Yes, I have a few! I'm sure you'd like my spaghetti carbonara. It's really easy to make and it's always a hit with everyone.
I'll have to try it sometime! I love pasta carbonara!
It's my favorite! What kind of music do you like?
I love a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into electronic music right now.
Oh, that's cool! I like some electronic music too. What are some of your favorite artists?
I love The Chainsmokers, Zedd, and Flume.
I love The Chainsmokers too! I've seen them live twice.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to see them live.
They're amazing live. You should definitely go see them if you get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
